author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
So far I'm down to 3-4 cigarettes per day, after tapering off for a week and a half.
Went ahead and purchased a reusable vape & two 3% nic flavors to minimize the waste of disposables.
I feel stronger physically & mentally already. But my increased sense of smell is annoying! https://t.co/ViO7h1HJQg

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
Not to mention Americans & politics swirling down the drain.
I'm open to change. I *need* direction, and passion. I'm tired of being self-restrained and contributing to the dominant western culture's parasitic relationship to the Earth.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
I am miserably aware the past few moments.
It's too late for Mr J, eight months was too long, Mt T & I are not here at his convenience if he decides he feels like it.
My jobs are worthless, enabling alcohol to deaden my community, and pampering the affluent who can afford to pay. https://t.co/KV0SsDe2Ai

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
I wouldn't suck or fuck any of my bosses for a raise or a better job.

However, there is one I'd consider letting go down on me if he wants me to do more hard work shifts.
Talk me into it, without words.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
I want. I want to be wanted.
I crave to touch, someone I adore, and seek to know more about.
I want to be wanted enough to be asked. I need an invitation.

(Unfortunately this applies to four different men... And none of it is going to happen. Wish me good dreams instead?)

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)

Never getting married again, but it's nice to get amped up for polyam.

I am 100% hot, 40% crazy, which places me in the marriage zone. https://t.co/WMZNimy8V6 via @idr_labs

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
My partner (m, cancer) and I (f, Gemini) are still all in for Mr J, and I'll blame it on astrology, LOL.

Damn magnetic Scorpio whose sun is conjunct our conjoined ascendants and my moon.
These men both have Cancer Mars (like bf's Sun & my Venus), and my Aries Mars is screaming.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
Re: the Cali guy
15 hours after giving him my number and no text yet...
"Did his text not go through? Am I having service problems? Was my handwriting illegible? Did I get a digit wrong?"
At self: Calm down, woman. Not everyone is as immediate and no BS as you. Let him breathe.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
I'm not reckless, I'm overly cautious. I overanalyze everything.
He has no need to worry about me picking up some random asshole.

*And yes, I did this with him as well.
He's a winner in my love lottery.
He's so fucking special.*

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
And:
My boyfriend sees how detailed and methodical I am about sifting clues to a potential's suitability via social media and every little conversation.

I'm not obsessive, I'm thorough.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
My partner/BF thinks I should be more succinct and not overwhelm prospects with specifics.

But... I want truly informed, enthusiastic consent.
And we're in Idaho, so careful discernment is important.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
It seems my standards for a new male mate have boiled down to:
Like nature?
Hate fascists?
Don't blindly follow the American cultural script?
Cool that I'm in a serious LTR?
Would be into respectful, pleasure-focused sex with me?

That's enough, right?

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
We held soft eye contact and smiles for three seconds as we passed in the hallway yesterday.
Mutual warmth and acknowledgement, and knowing we're not going to do anything about it.
Responsible adulting 😿

text:

He seems genuine delighted to see me each time. Damn I wish he hadn't noticed. https://t.co/RIbWarLI0P

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
I developed a legit lusty work-crush this week, Mr. F.
He's unavailable & mgmt & I'm fortunately immune if he's in normal business attire.
Monday he was in khaki casual, leaning back in a chair, and smiled with a little wave. I broke out into a full sweat & walked the other way.

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
Oh, I was way off on my guesstimate.
Maybe his ascendant is in an Earth sign.
Because I got his birthdate and he's very Scorpio, with an Aquarius moon, Cancer Mars, and a Libra/ Virgo cusp Venus.
Reassessment, more astrologically compatible w/ Mr. T than me. But still...

author: Ringside Apocalypse (she/her)
text:
Ugh, depressing.
We just had Mr. J out to our place to visit and he's miserably bougie...
He thinks about real estate like a landlord, and thinks about business like a manager.
I'm certain he was making less than $25/hr his whole life...
Strong suspicion that he's an earth sign.
